function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of infectious diseases through travel","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases across countries, regions, cities, and localities","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict travel restrictions, quarantine measures, and international cooperation for disease containment","Technologies":"Advanced screening technologies, digital health passports, and AI-based disease tracking systems","People":"Global travelers, residents of highly connected cities, and individuals in densely populated areas","Owner":"Government health agencies, international organizations, and transportation authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate urban planning for infectious disease containment","Impact":"Rapid spread of emerging infectious diseases in urban areas, leading to widespread health and economic crises","Mitigation":"Integrating infectious disease containment measures into urban planning, establishing robust surveillance systems, and implementing responsive healthcare policies","Technologies":"Smart city technologies, data-driven urban planning tools, and real-time disease tracking systems","People":"Urban planners, policymakers, and residents of urban areas","Owner":"Local government authorities and urban planning agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in office and residential buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory pandemics due to poor indoor air quality and limited ventilation","Mitigation":"Implementation of improved ventilation systems, air quality monitoring, and adherence to building design standards for disease prevention","Technologies":"HVAC systems with HEPA filters, air quality sensors, and building automation systems","People":"Occupants of office and residential buildings","Owner":"Building management companies and employers"}]}
